welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sevilla La Nueva, a charming Spanish town known for its rich history, lively culture, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily serving domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Barajas Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Barajas Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 2 hours.
